item.title: Priyam Alok's personal homepage
item.description: I am Priyam, an aspiring actuarial model developer. This is my personal homepage. I stumbled upon trading and capital markets at 17, which sparked my passion for understanding finance. For a brief period, I was in academia—studying Statistics (Honors) at the University of Calcutta, Kolkata under RKMRC, Narendrapur. So during this time, I was diving deep into financial markets and playing around with data-driven stuff. That curiosity eventually led me to actuarial science—and man, the gap between what you learn in theory and what actually happens in the industry was a real eye-opener.
